message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price of $180. I think you'll really love it!
Hi Alice, I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $130?
Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer the product to you for $160. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $160 is still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $140?

Hi Bob, I understand you're trying to get the best deal, but I'm not willing to go below $155. I'm willing to compromise, though. I can offer you the product for $152. It's the lowest I can go, and I think it's still a great value!
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $152 is still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $140?
